entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 06:54 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
